title: Lilium Terrarium
original_name: リリウム・テラリウム
sinopse:
Girls are troubled by many different things. Things involving love, friends, the latest trends, etc. And this is a youthful yuri omniverse story brought to you by these very girls.

(Source: Ichijinsha, translated)

1. Yurigokko
2. Yurigokko
3. Itsumo Issho nanoni
4. Ima Sugu ni Kotae ga Wakaranakutemo...
5. Love Letter
6. Mou Hitotsu, Love Letter
7. Mei-chan to Umi
8. Aki-chan to Umi
9. Mei-chan to Orei
10. Aki-chan to Orei
11. Mei-chan to Bansoukou
12. Aki-chan to Bansoukou
13. Mei-chan to Kokuhaku
14. Aki-chan to Kokuhaku
15. Mei-chan to Aki-chan
16. Natsu, Okujou nite
